paper.title: A Longitudinal Analysis of Computing in the Home
paper.venue: HOIT '00 Proceedings of the IFIP TC9 WG9.3 International Conference on Home Oriented Informatics and Telematics,: Information, Technology and Society
paper.abstract: This paper reports on the use of personal computers in the home. Analyses were conducted on US Census Current Population Survey data on computer usage from 1984 to 1997. Findings are presented with regard to the diffusion of ownership and usage pattems of personal computers in the home. Implications on social impact of home computing are discussed.
